text: Lai Chee-Ying (, born 8 December 1947), also known as Jimmy Lai, is a Hong Kong entrepreneur. He founded Giordano. He is one of the main supporters of the pro-democracy camp, especially to the Democratic Party. Lai is also an art collector. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:Hong Kong activists
title: Jimmy Lai
